txt.en: Heledon can be found in Minas Tirith.\n\nSpeak with Heledon.
'We stopped the Withered Tree this time, but I fear this is not the last we have heard of these damned fools.'
'Thank goodness you are here. I can deal with a lizard or two but not this Withered Tree!'
Complete Quest: Finding a Breach in the Darkness
Rathon can be found at the northern end of the Fourth Circle of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should speak with Rathon and assist him with protecting the Cisterns.
Rathon can be found at the northern end of the Fourth Circle of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should speak with Rathon and assist him with protecting the Cisterns.

'The Burgsmen's Fellowship has been trying to combat the Withered Tree, who spread lies to those good people who still dwell in the city. I have just gotten word that Rathon has had to deal with the Withered Tree in the Cisterns recently. You must talk to him as I am sure he could use assistance in dealing with these wayward minds.'
Heledon asks you to assist Rathon, the Warden of the Wells, in keeping the Cisterns out of the hands of the Enemy.
